name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-hybridwork-checkin
title: Hybrid Work Employee Check-in Adaptive Card Extension
shortDescription: Adaptive Card Extension that allows users to check in to the office.
longDescription: Adaptive Card Extension that allows users to check in for a desk in an office building. Stores data in a SharePoint list.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
